channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footpath on cnr of Kenilworth and Priory Park, out front of the lean to on no. 67 Priory Park., 9th July
item.description:
This site is constantly used for fly-tipping, today there is a large rug, as well as a box with a baby seat in it and other things.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 9th July
item.description:
There’s a car that’s been dumped in the driveway of 51 Stamford Hill for the past two weeks. It doesn’t belong to any of the residents, and no one has seen anyone coming to the car during this time. It’s also untaxed, and it’s just causing a hazard .

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stamford Hill, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please urgently remove this huge pile of dry leafs and dry weed, 9th July
item.description:
Please urgently remove this huge pile of dry leafs and dry weed lying in the middle of the pavement. It will create enormous mess all over the streets as soon as the wind will blow. It's an emergency. We suffer from long term health problems and we need to have our windows open to get fresh air.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Kelly Avenue, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 518, Old Kent Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Overgrown bush hanging over edge of wall causing an obstruction, 9th July
item.description:
This bush has been overgrown for quite sometime and its got thorns etc growing alongside it and its growing from inside of a property that was a former carehome located on bullace row about half way down from the top facing towards the right when heading down bullace row cant be missed it has a large black gate rear and front located next to the bike otherwise formally known as the father red cap its owned by a load of people who i am unsure of if its a company or just squatters but the bush itself is blocking the pavement and needs cutting back which is the responsibility of the people currently situated inside that property

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bullace Row, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clothing and Cardboard boxes dumped in front of the house., 9th July
item.description:
I wanted to raise a concern regarding some clothing and cardboard boxes that have been dumped in front of the house. Unfortunately, the items have been lying there for over a week now and are starting to become an eyesore. Additionally, several realtor signs were never collected and are still on the property, which adds to the untidiness of the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 525, Old Kent Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
